features: Plug and play: Aisizon A2d wireless lavalier microphone is directly applicable to Android phone and iPhone, simple operation allows you to easily complete record, video recording, live broadcasts.
2 Pack Wireless Lavalier Microphone: A2d wireless clip mic is shared by 2 people to record at the same time, no interference. no delay, and no need to transfer the receiver.
Free Lightning and USB Adapters: A2d dual wireless microphones are equipped with full adapters easily for IOS devices, iPhone, iPad, desktop computer, laptop, PSP, easy for zoom meating.
Level 3 Noise Reduction, 0.009s Ultra-low Latency: 360°omnidirectional radio, easy to block ambient sound, and live broadcast outdoors in real-time. Great for YouTube, live streaming, TikTok.
65 Feet (20m) Long-distance Wireless Bluetooth Transmission: The wireless microphone is completely free from the shackles of wire, allowing you to complete motion shooting, mobile phone recording.

Please charge the microphone for 1 hour before using the device. 3. Please read the user manual before use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: More models, more suitable for you. new model： Aisizon A5d wireless mic Aisizon A5d Wireless Lavalier Microphone with Noise Cancellation,HI-FI AUDIO, Wireless Lapel Microphone for iPhone 15/Pro/iPad, Android, for Tiktok, YouTube, Video Recording, Live Streaming.

Suitable for multiple devices NOTICE: 1.If iPhone/iPad cannot be matched, please exit all open programs and restart the device. 2.It cannot match iPhone 6 or lower,because the recording is done through the 3.5 audio port. 3.Some Samsung phones cannot be matched because it is not an open source system. 4.Laptop or recording equipment requires type-c port. *After our laboratory testing, except for the following Samsung smartphone version is not applicable, other versions are not found problems, please rest assured that the use of. DO NOT suitable for the following models: Galaxy C9pro/Galaxy Note8/Galaxy S8/Galaxy A40s/Galaxy F52 5G/W2018/Galaxy A50, A50S/Galaxy A60, A60S/Galaxy M30S/Galaxy A6S

How to use it on a computer/laptop by the usb adapter for zoom video conferencing. Key: Set the Aisizon wireless microphone as your computer's audio input device. Step 1: Find the speaker in the bottom right corner of the desktop, mouse over it, right click on "Open Sound Settings (E)" Step 2: In the "Sound" interface, find "Input" and select the sound input device as "Microphone". The setting is finished. Now, You can use your computer to record, make videos, or use ZOOM to video conference with colleagues. One tip: In the upper right corner of the "Sound" screen, find the "Sound Control Panel". Click on the "Sound" device, find the microphone, and click on the properties in the lower right corner. The microphone properties screen appears, click "Listen", then the sound of the microphone can be emitted from the computer speakers. Now, your computer will become a loudspeaker.

Type-c to Lightning adapter Use the Type-c to lightning adapter，it compatible with Apple device, as well as the ability to be used with most electronic devices without software.Multiple devices(Requires Type-c port) or groups of people can use this microphone, not limited to the connection port. Notice: If it is an iPhone/iPad device, and the adapter cannot be used, please exit all open programs or restart the device. During the live broadcast, please exit all programs so that the microphone has enough system resources to work.

Package Included: · 1 x receiver · 1 x Type-C to Lightning adapter · 1 x Type-C to USB adapter · 1 x USB data cable · 1 x User Manual How to make the microphone work better. 1.After use, please press and hold the power button to turn off the power, otherwise the microphone will continue to work until the battery runs out. 2. Please charge the microphone for 1 hour before using the device. 3. Please read the user manual before use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super quality and price
reviews.reviewText: I use these mics to present and record my university class lectures on zoom. I've always struggled to get a decent quality over puck mics and other in-room (expensive) conference room equipment. These mics just plain work -- great quality super easy to use with my laptop or phone... they sound great and don't conflict with the other in-room mics designed to pick up student questions and comments.For the price, I am super happy...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mic & price
reviews.reviewText: Great mics, super convenient and reliable. Great sound and range, plus extremely affordable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We have been using big ugly microphones for a long time. After we got these, we were so happy! They work great, sound is amazing and we are thrilled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really good quality sound, and easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: 05/10/2023 Update: There appears to be an issue with the batteries. I'm trying to figure it out. Several times now I'm in the middle of meetings and people can't hear me - the microphone has turned off. When I recharge the LED stays amber or it goes off but then turns on amber and won't go off (I have to press the power button for a while until it shuts off). I'm discharging the batteries and doing full charges to see if that improves the situation. Three of my four microphones show this issue. After this "reset" two of the microphones have stayed on for 5+ hours. Sharing this tip in case you run into it, too. Dropped one star because of this issue.-----I have a good lavalier microphone and have been wanting to get a wireless for some time but kept giving it a second and third thought due to their high cost. I am very glad that I found this product.- The audio quality is really good - better than my wired lavalier!- For those who care about such things, my electromagnetic meter doesn't detect anything harmful while using it, so it appears safe to use.- I bought the two-pack. I only need one but wanted to have the second in case I ever do interviews. In the meantime, it's nice having an extra all charged and ready to go.- They connect super easy without needing any software or driver installs - just plug in the dongle and use. The connection is immediate - no issues at all.- I bought a second set to take with me to the office. I did a test and confirmed that each receiver can only pair with TWO transmitters at a time. The pairing is automatic. Whichever two microphones are turned on will be the only ones that can communicate with a given transmitter.- The battery seems to last a long time. I haven't had any issues at all, and after long meetings the battery meter still shows green (full / strong charge).- There's no weight to the microphones or receiver. You could read that as "cheap plastic" or "feather light."- The only two minor annoyances are that (a) the clip is static (that does annoy me a bit, since I was used to putting on my lavalier with my left hand and now have to use my right hand ... like everything else, I'm sure this will go away with time), and (b) there's no mute / pause function that I've been able to figure out while using my PC.Great product at a great price. Definitely glad to give it a 5-star rating!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Who needs a recording studio when you have a wireless mic like this?
reviews.reviewText: Who needs a recording studio when you have this wireless mic? I can confidently say that my podcast has never sounded better, and I owe it all to this incredible piece of technology!First things first, let's talk about the convenience factor. With this wireless mic, I can record my podcast from anywhere. I could be sipping margaritas on a tropical beach or cozying up in my favorite onesie, and the mic will still capture my voice with pristine clarity. It's like having a personal recording studio in my pocket, minus the fancy soundproofing.But wait, there's more! The range on this mic is absolutely mind-blowing. I can leave my recording setup in one room, grab a snack from the kitchen, and continue recording without missing a beat. It's like having a personal assistant holding the mic for me while I go about my podcasting business. Talk about multitasking like a boss!Now, let's talk sound quality. This mic is a superhero when it comes to capturing the nuances of my voice. It picks up every whisper, every dramatic pause, and every giggle. My listeners will feel like they're right there in the room with me, experiencing all the podcasting magic. It's like having a loyal sidekick that enhances my voice to superhero levels!And can we talk about the design? This mic is so sleek and stylish that it's practically a fashion statement. I feel like a legit podcasting superstar when I hold it in my hand. Move over, Beyoncé, there's a new audio queen in town!In conclusion, if you're serious about podcasting and want to take your show to the next level, this wireless mic is an absolute game-changer. It's convenient, it has an incredible range, the sound quality is top-notch, and it looks like it belongs on the red carpet. Trust me, your podcasting journey will never be the same again. Prepare to rock the airwaves and make your listeners go wild with envy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for online meetings and many other situations!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a wireless microphone for company meetings where we had a mix of local and remote participants.Some locations do not have the equipment needed to sufficiently share audio with the people on the conference call, as room placed mics do not pickup the presenter in cases where they move around the room. These microphones allow the presenter to move while presenting and still provide high quality audio for those who are on the conference call. The audio quality is very good and the battery life works for most meetings. If the meeting goes longer you can can quickly swap out the mics, since there are 2 included in this purchase.Easy to setup and connect to the presenters laptop and works really well.Overall, these are great wireless microphones that will work for multiple applications.

reviews.reviewTitle: Product work across the iphone and ipad pro
reviews.reviewText: Audio pick up is quite strong so its better to not have it close.

reviews.reviewTitle: It works right out of the box
reviews.reviewText: Even though the web page says it doesn't work with some Samsung phones, it worked with my Samsung Galaxy S21+.The sound quality seems pretty good.I haven't had a chance to test it in windy conditions yet.For a dual wireless mic setup, I would say it's good value.

reviews.reviewTitle: Oh the sound quality is just awful. What a waste of money.
reviews.reviewText: I bought these looking at the description saying they were clear and crisp. Nope. Honestly, it's better just using the phone's mic directly. Terrible.
Used it with an iPhone and the audio quality is worse than the inbuilt iPhone mic.
